about_the_game:
PixageFX Studio is the flagship of the PixageFX family. With PixageFX Studio you can turn photos, videos and animated GIFs into pixel art, oil paints, abstract paintings, cartoons, comics, sketches and more. In addition, thanks to its parametric structure, you can perform transform operations and much more that you may need every day.

PixageFX Studio has hundreds of modules. Each module is completely parametric. Just add the relevant module to your project for the action you want to do.

For detailed information about PixageFX Studio, please visit our website. Please see the PixageFX Comparison chart for differences with other PixageFX family

In addition, thanks to its parametric structure, you can perform transform operations and much more that you may need every day.

PixageFX Studio has hundreds of modules. Each module is completely parametric. Just add the relevant module to your project for the action you want to do.

For detailed information about PixageFX Studio, please visit our website. Please see the PixageFX Comparison chart for differences with other PixageFX family
name: PixageFX Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space

short_description: PixageFX Studio is a brand new, parametric image/video/animated GIF editing, pixel art converter / generator and game graphic materials, sketches, cartoons, abstract paintings, illustrations,ascii art (and more) creation software that anyone can use.
